verses.verse: Remember, <WH2142> O Lord, <WH3068> what <WH4100> has befallen <WH1961> us; Look, <WH5027> and see <WH7200> our reproach! <WH2781>
Our inheritance <WH5159> has been turned <WH2015> over to strangers, <WH2114> Our houses <WH1004> to aliens. <WH5237>
We have become <WH1961> orphans <WH3490> without <WH369> a father, Our mothers <WH1> are like widows. <WH517>
We have to pay <WH3701> for our drinking <WH8354> water, <WH4325> Our wood <WH6086> comes <WH935> [to us] at a price. <WH4242>
Our pursuers <WH7291> are at our necks; <WH6677> We are worn <WH3021> out, there is no <WH3808> rest <WH5117> for us.
We have submitted <WH5414> <WH3027> to Egypt <WH4714> [and] Assyria <WH804> to get <WH7646> enough <WH7646> bread. <WH3899>
Our fathers sinned, <WH1> [and] are no <WH2398> more; <WH369> It is we who have borne <WH369> their iniquities. <WH5445>
Slaves <WH5650> rule <WH4910> over us; There <WH369> is no <WH369> one <WH369> to deliver <WH6561> us from their hand. <WH3027>
We get <WH935> our bread <WH3899> at the risk of our lives <WH5315> Because <WH4480> <WH6440> of the sword <WH2719> in the wilderness. <WH4057>
Our skin <WH5785> has become <WH3648> as hot <WH3648> as an oven, <WH8574> Because <WH4480> <WH6440> of the burning <WH2152> heat <WH2152> of famine. <WH7458>
They ravished <WH6031> the women <WH802> in Zion, <WH6726> The virgins <WH1330> in the cities <WH5892> of Judah. <WH3063>
Princes <WH8269> were hung <WH8518> by their hands; <WH3027> Elders <WH2205> were not respected. <WH1921>
Young <WH970> men <WH970> worked <WH5375> at the grinding <WH2911> mill; <WH2911> And youths <WH5288> stumbled <WH3782> under [loads] of wood. <WH6086>
Elders <WH2205> are gone <WH7673> from the gate, <WH8179> Young <WH970> men <WH970> from their music. <WH5058>
The joy <WH4885> of our hearts <WH3820> has ceased; <WH7673> Our dancing <WH4234> has been turned <WH2015> into mourning. <WH60>
The crown <WH5850> has fallen <WH5307> from our head; <WH7218> Woe <WH188> to us, for we have sinned! <WH2398>
Because <WH5921> of this <WH2088> our heart <WH3820> is faint; <WH1739> Because <WH5921> of these <WH428> things <WH428> our eyes <WH5869> are dim; <WH2821>
Because <WH5921> of Mount <WH2022> Zion <WH6726> which <WH7945> lies <WH8074> desolate, <WH8074> Foxes <WH7776> prowl <WH1980> in it.
Thou, O Lord, <WH3068> dost rule <WH3427> forever; <WH5769> Thy throne <WH3678> is from generation <WH1755> to generation. <WH1755>
Why <WH4100> dost Thou forget <WH7911> us forever; <WH5331> Why dost Thou forsake <WH5800> us so <WH753> <WH3117> long <WH753> <WH3117>?
Restore <WH7725> us to Thee, O Lord, <WH3068> that we may be restored; <WH7725> Renew <WH2318> our days <WH3117> as of old, <WH6924>
Unless <WH3588> <WH518> Thou hast utterly <WH3988> rejected <WH3988> us, [And] art exceedingly <WH5704> <WH3966> angry <WH7107> with us.
